title: 820-00165 A1466 No battery
message:
Board powers on and boots fine with charger, known good batteries display 0%, dies, and it does not charge. 

Corrosion around C1204, and U6101 area
 
I tested the continuity on U6101 and all the connections seem to be fine still

title: 820-00165 A1466 No battery
message:
Post exact PPBUS_G3H voltage, w/ and w/o battery connected.
Also check voltage and diode mode to ground at SCL/SDA lines of battery bus.

title: 820-00165 A1466 No battery
message:
PPBUS_G3H:
           8.62 V - Just Charger
           1.8 V and dropping steadily - Just battery
           5.99V - Bat & Charger

I'm sorry but I couldn't find the SCL and SDA lines related to the battery
Note: Sometimes the fan does spin fast and sometimes doesn't
This is what I did find related to the battery:

title: 820-00165 A1466 No battery
message:
Looks like battery is charging.
Let it connected more time and voltage should increase more than 6-7V ("5.9V ( Rising)").

"I'm sorry but I couldn't find the SCL and SDA lines related to the battery"
No idea, looking at battery conector in schematic???
These values should be good, as PPBUS_G3H is correctly controlled.

There should be bad battery, or broken connector.
